natural_language_plan: • Unstacking b from a makes a clear and frees up b. • Putting down b ensures it is available to support c. • Picking up c allows it to be placed on b. • Stacking c on b satisfies part of the goal by placing c on b. • Picking up a prepares it to be placed on c. • Stacking a on c completes the goal by placing a on c and c on b.

reasoning_steps: Step 2: Put down b on the table.
Step 3: Pick up c from the table.
Step 5: Pick up a from the table.
rationale: • Unstacking b from a makes a clear and frees up b.
• Putting down b ensures it is available to support c.
• Picking up c allows it to be placed on b.
• Stacking c on b satisfies part of the goal by placing c on b.
• Picking up a prepares it to be placed on c.
• Stacking a on c completes the goal by placing a on c and c on b.
